hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="ELK-$$" /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init login /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init build /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init start
#vm image fixup /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'rm /etc/apt/sources.list.d/meta_depot.list;apt-get clean;apt-get update;apt-get purge -y rsyslog rsyslog-gssapi puppet puppet-common;rm -rf /etc/puppet /var/lib/puppet /etc/cron.d/meta_puppet*'
/puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'wget http://home.zcu.cz/~bodik/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh rsyslog-client.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh glastopf.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh nfdump.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'ps faxu' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog7_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-client_netstat.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x glastopf/tests/glastopf.sh' /puppet/jenkins/magrathea.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x netflow/tests/nfdump.sh'
